name: Touhou Fangame ~ Endless Blue Sky
description:
♣ Thank you for playing one of my 東方 Fangames!
♣ This game is connected to "The Mirror's lllusion", my 7th touhou fangame.
     https://vge.itch.io/thfg-7-tmi
♣ Have fun and please beat it, it's only 2 stages.

███████████████████▌Getting Started▐█████████████████████

♣   If you want to read the manual select it from the menu screen. 
♣   IMPORTANT!!! You only have 1 live in this game!!!

➤  Move with the arrows: ◄▲▼►
➤  Shoot/Confirm with: X
➤  Focus/Cancel with: Z
➤  Mute/Use Special with: C

♣  Make sure your language is set to ENG! If not then
      hit Alt+Shift and change it.  Scratch only reads ENG!!

██████████████████▌Purpose of the Game▐███████████████████

♣  Clear both stages and beat the bosses.
♣  Dodge all the bullets.
♣  Collect as many items as you can.

███████████████████████▌Menu▐███████████████████████

♣  START: Here you can play the game and enjoy the  story. Start with this after you       
      read the manual.
♣  PRACTICE: Here you can practice the Spellcards  from the  bosses.
♣  MUSIC ROOM: Here you can listen to the music tracks I composed for this game!
♣  RECORDS: Here you can see highscores and some other stuff.
♣  CREDITS: Here you can find out who made this fan-game! (me)
♣  MANUAL: Definatelly read this before playing!
♣  QUIT: Useles Quit button that exists for decoration.

███████████████████████▌Other▐███████████████████████

♣  Just like in my other touhou fangames, the enemies do not have hitboxes but the bullets always have.
♣  The 3rd download is an .exe version of the game (works on 64 bit windows).
♣  The 1st one is a .sb3 version of the game (works with scratch desctop).
